titles.title: America's Teachers Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend and increase the deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers.
America's Teachers Tax Relief Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: America's Teachers Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the tax deduction for certain expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers and extend such deduction through 2010.
